block.comment: Get the supervisor of the employee and check whether the employee is already inactive.  Search for the employee based on external id and get all versions of employee that start with the employee number (in case one employee was created in multiple subsidiaries).

properties.label: Supervisor ID
properties.hint:
Prefix the value with internalid: to pass Internal ID of the record or externalid: to pass External ID of the record.Eg: externalid:50130000000014c.
If no prefix is used, the value will be considered as Internal ID.
properties.name: f_2295_custrecordr7hremployeeautotermsupervisor

properties.label: Employee ID
properties.hint:
Prefix the value with internalid: to pass Internal ID of the record or externalid: to pass External ID of the record.Eg: externalid:50130000000014c.
If no prefix is used, the value will be considered as Internal ID.
